name: Dragonspine Spear
desc: A spear created from the fang of a dragon. It is oddly warm to the touch.

customize.desc: A spear created from the fang of a dragon. It is oddly warm to the touch.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Northlander Polearm Billet
customize.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star polearms.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

customize.name: Starsilver
customize.desc: A rare and precious ore formed by the unique geographical conditions and Ley Lines of Dragonspine.

customize.name: Empowered Dragontooth
customize.desc: A Dragontooth infused with power. Its luster and texture appear to have been somewhat transformed...

customize.name: Diagram: Dragonspine Spear
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Dragonspine Spear (Polearm).

customize.text: , which can be obtained from completing the <color=#37ffff>World Quest - The Festering Fang</color>

customize.name: Dragonspine Spear
customize.desc: A spear created from the fang of a dragon. It is oddly warm to the touch.

customize.name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver
customize.desc: An ancient greatsword that was stored between frescoes. Forged from Starsilver, it has the power to cleave through ice and snow.

customize.name: Frostbearer
customize.desc: A fruit that possesses a strange, frosty will. A faint sense of agony emanates from it.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Boreal Wolf's Milk Tooth
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Andrius' wolf pack is its blessed honor guard, and even the milk teeth of a wolf cub possess great potential.
In the past, the gods had the responsibility to love all people. Andrius was therefore quite unusual in that he became leader of the wolves, while only welcoming abandoned babies and wanderers when it came to humans.

materials.name: Mist Grass Pollen
materials.desc: Strange spores created by Mist Grass in enclosed spaces. They are the Cicins' favorite food.

materials.name: Recruit's Insignia
materials.desc: An insignia to identify the recruits. Makes one wonder about what the ones joining the Fatui's war machine were thinking.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Boreal Wolf's Cracked Tooth
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The life of a wolf is not without violence; broken bones or cracked teeth are nothing special.
Andrius found humans to be a disappointment, but believed babies to be innocent. If both the wolf pack and the adopted children chose each other, then they become a Lupical, a fated family.

materials.name: Mist Grass Pollen
materials.desc: Strange spores created by Mist Grass in enclosed spaces. They are the Cicins' favorite food.

materials.name: Recruit's Insignia
materials.desc: An insignia to identify the recruits. Makes one wonder about what the ones joining the Fatui's war machine were thinking.

materials.name: Boreal Wolf's Cracked Tooth
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The life of a wolf is not without violence; broken bones or cracked teeth are nothing special.
Andrius found humans to be a disappointment, but believed babies to be innocent. If both the wolf pack and the adopted children chose each other, then they become a Lupical, a fated family.

materials.name: Mist Grass
materials.desc: Well-preserved Mist Grass. Some would take advantage of the Cicins' love for the Mist Grass to control them.

materials.name: Sergeant's Insignia
materials.desc: An insignia with a different shape to distinguish the sergeants from new recruits. Perhaps there are complicated emotions behind it.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Boreal Wolf's Broken Fang
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The wolf pack also understands that humans are not solitary creatures. The honorary broken tooth is a parting gift said to bring protection and luck.
In the legends of a far-off world, a female wolf once adopted two great humans. Their home was known as the Cave of Wolves, or Lupercal - that word meaning the same thing as Lupical does in this world.

materials.name: Mist Grass
materials.desc: Well-preserved Mist Grass. Some would take advantage of the Cicins' love for the Mist Grass to control them.

materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The wolf pack also understands that humans are not solitary creatures. The honorary broken tooth is a parting gift said to bring protection and luck.
In the legends of a far-off world, a female wolf once adopted two great humans. Their home was known as the Cave of Wolves, or Lupercal - that word meaning the same thing as Lupical does in this world.

materials.name: Mist Grass Wick
materials.desc: A rare bundle of Mist Grass that gives off a faint glow. Those who carry it invite both the Cicins and misfortune.

materials.name: Lieutenant's Insignia
materials.desc: An insignia to identify officers. The Fatui possess a colossal army, so there must be something extraordinary about the ones who achieved this rank within the group.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Boreal Wolf's Nostalgia
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The Wolf King, believing himself to despise humans, thought himself unable to envision a happy life for humanity, making him unworthy of becoming the Lord of the Winds of the world. Therefore, he chose to disappear. Yet, in truth, he gazes on the ones abandoned by the world ever so gently.

materials.name: Mist Grass Wick
materials.desc: A rare bundle of Mist Grass that gives off a faint glow. Those who carry it invite both the Cicins and misfortune.

materials.name: Lieutenant's Insignia
materials.desc: An insignia to identify officers. The Fatui possess a colossal army, so there must be something extraordinary about the ones who achieved this rank within the group.

desc.text:
He had a very, very long dream...
He dreamed that he and everyone else had gone on a long, long journey,
Into a land where green grass grew, and where soulful songs were sung.
He dreamed that he sang along with the gentle people of this land,
And danced in the skies with a dragon as beauteous as a jewel.
When he opened his eyes, he was in the sky above a mountain swept by roaring snowstorms.
The green, tranquil land had already been painted crimson by fire and blood,
And the song of that sky-blue bard's lyre was almost drowned in the howling tumult.
And that bejeweled, lovely dragon, like a tender lover,
Had now pierced his neck through with its sharp fangs.
"Farewell, Mother! My journey is ended."
"I shall sleep beneath this white, shining silver... and perhaps this, too, is good."
"Farewell, O lovely bard! And farewell, O lovely dragon!"
"Would that we had met in a different time and place,"
"To meet, to sing and dance together!"
So he thought most sincerely as he lay dying.
"Now then, this great blessing that pulses through my veins,"
"And the lovely sight of the dark universe that gave me birth..."
"They are now yours to inherit."

value.text:
Forged
World Quest - The Festering Fang

Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a <color=#37ffff>60%/70%/80%/90%/100%</color> chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to <color=#37ffff>80%/95%/110%/125%/140%</color> of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to <color=#37ffff>200%/240%/280%/320%/360%</color> of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.
